title: Kitāb al-mawāʻiz ẉa-al-iʻtibār bi-dhikr al-khitạt ẉa-al-āthār yakhtasṣu dhalika bi-akhbār Iqlīm Misṛ wa-al-Nīl wa-dhikr al-Qāhirah wa-mā yataʻallaq bi-hā wa-bi-Iqlīmhā
